pr_title: [C++] Fix message id is always the default value in send callback

timeline.message: Fix bug: sendCallback's 2nd argument was always the default MessageId
Set batch index for each message's callback of batch
Add test for message id in send callback

timeline.bodyText: There's no hard guarantee that this callback will be executed before the receive loop is done.
timeline.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText: Thank you for pointing out this! I missed the point that the SendReceipt to producer is not guaranteed to be completed before the consumer's receive() done. I'll do some work on it.
replies.author: BewareMyPower

replies.bodyText: There is a Latch class in lib/ that might be helpful here.

replies.bodyText: Thanks! I found the Latch just now :)
